TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringReader extends System.IO.TextReader
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringReader extends System.IO.TextReader

summary.span: 实现从字符串进行读取的 。

span.span: Implements a that reads from a string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使你能够同步或异步读取字符串。 enables you to read a string synchronously or asynchronously. 您可以使用 或 方法一次读取一个字符，使用 或 方法一次读取一个字符，使用 或 方法一次读取一个字符串。You can read a character at a time with the or the method, a line at a time using the or the method and an entire string using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以异步方式读取整个字符串。The following example shows how to read an entire string asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReader#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReader#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/vb/example2.vb#2)]

## Remarks 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Closes the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关创建文件和将文本写入文件的示例，请参阅[如何：将文本写入文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 有关从文件读取文本的示例，请参阅[如何：从文件读取文本](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 有关从二进制文件读取和写入二进制文件的示例，请参阅[如何：读取和写入到新创建的数据文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 此方法将重写 方法。This method overrides the method. 此 `Close` 实现调用 ，方法传递 `true` 值。This implementation of `Close` calls the , method passing a `true` value. 调用 `Close`后，其他方法可能会引发异常。Following a call to `Close`, other methods might throw an exception.

override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

summary.span: 返回下一个可用字符，但不使用它。

span.span: Returns the next available character but does not consume it.

returns.span: 一个表示下一个要读取的字符的整数；如果没有更多可读取的字符或该流不支持查找，则为 -1。

span.span: An integer representing the next character to be read, or -1 if no more characters are available or the stream does not support seeking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个整数值，以确定文件的末尾或发生了其他错误。The method returns an integer value in order to determine whether the end of the file, or another error has occurred. 这允许用户首先检查返回值是否为-1，然后再将其强制转换为 类型。This allows a user to first check if the returned value is -1 before casting it to a type. 此方法将重写 方法。This method overrides the method. 此操作不会更改 `StringReader` 的当前位置。The current position of the `StringReader` is not changed by this operation. 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.||

exception.span: 当前读取器已关闭。

span.span: The current reader is closed.

summary.span: 读取输入字符串中的下一个字符并将该字符的位置提升一个字符。

returns.span: 基础字符串中的下一个字符，或者如果没有更多的可用字符，则为 -1。

span.span: The next character from the underlying string, or -1 if no more characters are available.

returns.span: 读入缓冲区的总字符数。

returns.span: 如果当前没有那么多字符可用，则总字符数可能会少于所请求的字符数，或者如果已到达基础字符串的结尾，则总字符数为零。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 方法将从 读取 `count` 个字符，直到从 `index`位置开始 `buffer` 字符数组。The method will read up to `count` characters from the into the `buffer` character array starting at position `index`. 返回读取的实际字符数，如果已到达字符串的末尾并且未读取任何字符，则返回零。Returns the actual number of characters read, or zero if the end of the string has been reached and no characters are read. 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)|

param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 从当前位置开始异步读取输入字符串中的所有字符，并将当前位置移到输入字符串的末尾。

span.span: Asynchronously reads all the characters from the input string, starting at the current position, and advances the current position to the end of the input string.

returns.span: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 参数的值包含读入缓冲区的总字符数。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of characters read into the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int> ReadAsync (char[] buffer, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int32> ReadAsync(char[] buffer, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ReadAsync (buffer As Char(), index As Integer, count As Integer) As Task(Of Integer)
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<int> ^ ReadAsync(cli::array <char> ^ buffer, int index, int count);
override this.ReadAsync : char[] * int * int -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int>

param.name: buffer
param.span: 当此方法返回时，包含指定的字符数组，此数组中 和 ( + - 1) 之间的值被从当前源中读取的字符所替换。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.

param.name: index
param.span: 在 中开始写入的位置。

span.span: The position in at which to begin writing.

param.name: count
param.span: 最多读取的字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters to read.

param.span: 如果在写入指定数目的字符到缓冲区之前，就已经达到字符串的末尾，则方法返回。

span.span: If the end of the string is reached before the specified number of characters is written into the buffer, the method returns.

summary.span: 异步从当前字符串中读取指定数目的字符并从指定索引开始将该数据写入缓冲区。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current string asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 参数的值包含读入缓冲区的总字节数。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可能小于所请求的字节数，或者如果已到达字符串的末尾时，则为 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the string has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在读取 `count` 参数指定的字符数或到达字符串的末尾后，该任务完成。The task completes after either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read or the end of the string is reached. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以异步方式读取字符串的前23个字符。The following example shows how to read the first 23 characters of a string asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/vb/example1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 或 为负数。

span.span: or is negative.

exception.span: 和 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.

exception.span: 字符串读取器已被释放。

span.span: The string reader has been disposed.

exception.span: 以前的读取操作当前正在使用读取器。

param.name: buffer
param.span: 当此方法返回时，包含指定的字符数组，此数组中 和 ( + - 1) 之间的值被从当前源中读取的字符所替换。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.

param.name: index
param.span: 在 中开始写入的位置。

span.span: The position in at which to begin writing.

param.name: count
param.span: 最多读取的字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters to read.

param.span: 如果在写入指定数目的字符到缓冲区之前，就已经达到字符串的末尾，则方法返回。

span.span: If the end of the string is reached before the specified number of characters is written into the buffer, the method returns.

summary.span: 异步从当前字符串中读取指定数目的字符并从指定索引开始将该数据写入缓冲区。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current string asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 参数的值包含读入缓冲区的总字节数。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可能小于所请求的字节数，或者如果已到达字符串的末尾时，则为 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the string has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直到读取 `count` 参数指定的字符数或已到达字符串的末尾，才能完成该任务。The task does not complete until either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read, or the end of the string has been reached.

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 或 为负数。

span.span: or is negative.

exception.span: 和 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.

exception.span: 字符串读取器已被释放。

span.span: The string reader has been disposed.

exception.span: 以前的读取操作当前正在使用读取器。

span.span: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ReadLine ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ReadLine() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ReadLine () As String
public: override System::String ^ ReadLine();
override this.ReadLine : unit -> string

summary.span: 从当前字符串中读取一行字符并将数据作为字符串返回。

span.span: Reads a line of characters from the current string and returns the data as a string.

returns.span: 当前字符串中的下一行；或为 （如果到达了字符串的末尾）。

span.span: The next line from the current string, or if the end of the string is reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法将重写 方法。This method overrides the method. 行定义为字符序列，后跟换行符（"\n"）、回车符（"\r"）、后跟换行符的回车符（"\r\n"）或流结束标记。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"), or the end-of-stream marker. 返回的字符串不包含终止回车符或换行符。The string that is returned does not contain the terminating carriage return or line feed. 如果到达了流结束标记，则返回的值为 `null`。The returned value is `null` if the end-of-stream marker has been reached. 也就是说，如果最后一行读取和流末尾标记之间没有任何内容，则该方法将返回 `null`。That is to say, if there is nothing between the last line read and the end-of-stream marker, the method returns `null`. 如果当前方法引发 ，则读取器在基础字符串中的位置将由该方法可以读取的字符数提前，但已读入内部 缓冲区的字符将被丢弃。If the current method throws an , the reader's position in the underlying string is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 因为在字符串中读取器的位置不能更改，所以已读的字符不可恢复，只能通过重新初始化 来访问。Because the position of the reader in the string cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 若要避免这种情况，请使用 方法，并在预分配的缓冲区中存储读取字符。To avoid such a situation, use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#2)]

exception.span: 当前读取器已关闭。

span.span: The current reader is closed.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来为返回的字符串分配缓冲区。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.

summary.span: 读取从当前位置到字符串的结尾的所有字符并将它们作为单个字符串返回。

span.span: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the string and returns them as a single string.

returns.span: 从当前位置到基础字符串的结尾之间的内容。

span.span: The content from the current position to the end of the underlying string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法将重写 方法。This method overrides the method. 如果当前方法引发 ，则读取器在基础字符串中的位置将由该方法可以读取的字符数提前，但已读入内部 缓冲区的字符将被丢弃。If the current method throws an , the reader's position in the underlying string is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 因为在字符串中读取器的位置不能更改，所以已读的字符不可恢复，只能通过重新初始化 来访问。Because the position of the reader in the string cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 若要避免这种情况，请使用 方法，并在预分配的缓冲区中存储读取字符。To avoid such a situation, use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
